title: Workspace Default Parameters
description: These parameters are required for all workspaces

display_name.title: Name for the workspace
display_name.description: The name of the workspace to be displayed to users

address_space_size.title: Address space size
address_space_size.description: Network address size (small, medium, large or custom) to be used by the workspace

address_space.title: Address space
address_space.description: Network address space to be used by the workspace if address_space_size is custom
